name: Extravehicular Activity
description:
Extra Vehicular activity is a video game where our main character found himself stranded alone on a moonbase which has been attacked and overrunned by an extraterrestrial space faring race, which pretends to claim the moon as theirs to posteriorly initiate a full scale invasion of earth. The base which you used to call home is greatly damaged and no longer can shelter you from the dangers of space, you need to repair the ship by finding replacement parts scattered all over the moon station so you may take the warning back to earth and face this threat.

GitHub: https://github.com/JoseDG-09/GameJam2.git
